trustfund:
TF023306-FYR MACEDONIA SOCIAL SECTOR
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT,TF029661-PHRD-SOCIAL SECTORS ADJUSTMENT CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Social Sector
            Adjustment Credit Project are: (a) to place key social
            sector programs on a long run fiscally sustainable path
            through the reduction of the level and duration or program
            benefits, increase in cost recovery and the facilitation of
            the private provision of services; (b) to increase labor
            market distortions inherent in social sector programs, as
            well as the labor code; and to reduce poverty by improving
            the quality of social sector programs and their targeting.
            The project components include: (a) a fundamental reform of
            the pension system consistent with a move towards a funded
            privately managed system; (b) a long term health sector
            reform strategy to improve health status and contain health
            care costs; (c) improved solvency of the Employment Fund and
            an increase in labor market flexibility; (d) reform of the
            hiring and termination process embodied in the Law on Labor
            Relations; and (e) adequate budgeting and delivery of social
            assistance benefits.
